projects.name: WorkFlow Board

projects.name: DevLaunch
projects.description: Fully fledged website with attractive UI to bind developer jobs for freshers by fetching them through APIs. Filtering the data with 90% accuracy and storing it in NoSQL database and automatically updating it regularly.

projects.name: Command Line Tool
projects.description: Invented an intuitive CLI tool for process automation, adding boilerplate code, building & executing, program files, shell scripts, etc. The project boosting productivity by 50% during online contests & routine work. A command line program that accepts text input to execute operating system functions using NodeJS.

experiences.description: Worked on Kartify project as a Backend developer using Lamp technology, built Reports panel for daily dispatch, return order management, daily sales report, performance analysis of month, inventory management. Solved multiple Jira tickets and helped in updating and enhancing e-commerce websites, keeping them current with the latest product offerings, promotions, and user interface improvements. Ensured a seamless online shopping experience for customers.
